nodes.text: The Coruscant Cascader BPEA-IA was a piece of jewellery developed by Farbreini MicroElectronics Limited based on the planet Coruscant.

Described as an electronic molecular excitation net, the Cascader produced a light show that used a matrix of custom-designed light shapes that could be used to accentuate a wearer's figure and highlight their positive attributes. The Cascader was perfectly safe to wear, although its power requirements meant that people touching it would experience a slight tingling sensation.
